title: Register the same clase two times active_admin and rails 4

milestone.description: Bug fixes and small enhancements for 0.6.0

body:
I'm trying to migrate my rails 3 app, to rails 4
In my rails 3 app I have this:
application.rb

``` ruby
ActiveAdmin.register Instructor, as: "Applications" do
  menu parent: 'Instructors'
  scope :all_applications, default: true
  scope :unsubmitted
  scope :iced
  # ...
```

instructor.rb

``` ruby
ActiveAdmin.register Instructor do
  menu parent: 'Instructors', label: 'Approved Instructors'
  scope :active, default: true
  scope :contracted
  # ...
```

In rails 3 application is woking properly, but in rails 4, it's not showing the routes for instructor.

```
batch_action_admin_applications POST       /admin/applications/batch_action(.:format)                                    admin/applications#batch_action
                             admin_applications GET        /admin/applications(.:format)                                                 admin/applications#index
                                                POST       /admin/applications(.:format)                                                 admin/applications#create
                          new_admin_application GET        /admin/applications/new(.:format)                                             admin/applications#new
                         edit_admin_application GET        /admin/applications/:id/edit(.:format)                                        admin/applications#edit
                              admin_application GET        /admin/applications/:id(.:format)                                             admin/applications#show
                                                PUT        /admin/applications/:id(.:format)                                             admin/applications#update
                                                DELETE     /admin/applications/:id(.:format)                                             admin/applications#destroy
batch_action_admin_instructors POST       /admin/instructors/batch_action(.:format)                                     admin/instructors#batch_action
                              admin_instructors GET        /admin/instructors(.:format)                                                  admin/instructors#index
                                                POST       /admin/instructors(.:format)                                                  admin/instructors#create
                           new_admin_instructor GET        /admin/instructors/new(.:format)                                              admin/instructors#new
                          edit_admin_instructor GET        /admin/instructors/:id/edit(.:format)                                         admin/instructors#edit
                               admin_instructor GET        /admin/instructors/:id(.:format)                                              admin/instructors#show
                                                PUT        /admin/instructors/:id(.:format)                                              admin/instructors#update
                                                DELETE     /admin/instructors/:id(.:format)                                              admin/instructors#destroy
```

but in rails 4, I can get the instructor routes detected, and can't acces to instructors

```
batch_action_admin_applications POST       /admin/applications/batch_action(.:format)                                    admin/applications#batch_action
                             admin_applications GET        /admin/applications(.:format)                                                 admin/applications#index
                                                POST       /admin/applications(.:format)                                                 admin/applications#create
                          new_admin_application GET        /admin/applications/new(.:format)                                             admin/applications#new
                         edit_admin_application GET        /admin/applications/:id/edit(.:format)                                        admin/applications#edit
                              admin_application GET        /admin/applications/:id(.:format)                                             admin/applications#show
                                                PATCH      /admin/applications/:id(.:format)                                             admin/applications#update
                                                PUT        /admin/applications/:id(.:format)                                             admin/applications#update
                                                DELETE     /admin/applications/:id(.:format)                                             admin/applications#destroy
```

I will appreciate any help
